Ectomorph Detail1.title: Specifications
Ectomorph Detail1.detail:
- Rapid metabolism
- Skinny body
- Poor chest and shoulders
- Long ground and hands
- Can not easily increase weight
- When you do not exercise, you lose weight quickly
- Can eat whatever he wants
- Low fat content

Ectomorph Detail2.title: Method of training
Ectomorph Detail2.detail:
- 20 minutes a week in one time Cardio exercises on moving away
- (60-45 minutes) is longer and not limited to the duration of training 
- 6 to 10 repetitions
- 6 Up to 8 rounds per exercise
- 2 mins on no flights No breaks between duration
- My food is complementary

- Omega 3 kapsel

Full Body Training Plan.Name: Full Body Training Plan
Full Body Training Plan.Notes:
This plan aims a total training of all body muscles. It's considered as one of the best and easiest training methods for beginners as it contributes in getting good results.

It could be accomplished as following:
- Exercises number :  8- 12
- Sets number : 3- 4
- Rest duration : 60- 120 seconds

Beginner.Name: Beginner
Beginner.Notes: Twice a week with at least one day rest between training sessions. Keep repeating the same exercises.

Advanced.Name: Advanced
Advanced.Notes: 3 times per week with at least one day rest between training sessions. Keep repeating the same exercises.

2er-Split Training.Name: 2er-Split Training
2er-Split Training.Notes:
- This plan is designed for advanced level individuals. It aims to build strong muscles and increase strength.
- Although this plan is not very used, it helps to build strong muscles as the muscles are trained in different ways. The legend Arnold Schwarzenegger said that this plan type helped him to get "Mister Universe" as he was training the muscle twice to three times per week.
- It can be accomplished as following:

3er-Split Training.Name: 3er-Split Training
3er-Split Training.Notes:
- This plan is designed for men as well as women with less than 6 months training experience and who aim to get to a higher level.
- The total duration of training + warming should not exceed 80 minutes.
- The exercises should be changed each 4 - 6 weeks so that the body don't get used to.
It can be accomplished as following:

4er-Split Training.Name: 4er-Split Training
4er-Split Training.Notes:
This plan is designed for athletes with an experience of more than 6 months.
- The quality of training is more important than the reps amount.
A good warming is essential for any strength training to avoid any risk of injury.
The plan could be accomplished as following:

5x5 Traningsplan.Name: 5x5 Traningsplan
5x5 Traningsplan.Notes:
- This plan is designed for beginners as well as advanced athletes. It aims to increase body strength. It is based on an easy and very efficient training method.
- Training 3 times per week.
- 5 sets and 5 reps per exercise.
- Rest between sets: 2-3 minutes
- Training level: beginner, intermediate, advanced

Beginner's week example:

 Monday: 5x5 with 85 % of maximum weight.
  Wednesday: 5x5 with 85 % of maximum weight.
  Friday: 5x5 with 85 % of maximum weight.

Advanced week example:
  Monday: 5x5 with 85 % of maximum weight.
  Wednesday: 5x5 with 65 % of maximum weight.
  Friday: 5x5 with 70-80 as maximum weight

It could be accomplished as following:

Muscle training three times a week: Muscle training three times a week
